snippet: The company included a $7.9 billion pretax loss related to accounting adjustments for gains and losses on pension and benefit plans.
abstract: AT&T announces that it will take $10 billion in charges during its fourth quarter, sending down shares; charges will include a $7.9 billion pretax loss related to pension accounting adjustments.
lead_paragraph: The company included a $7.9 billion pretax loss related to accounting adjustments for gains and losses on pension and benefit plans.

headline.print_headline: AT&T to Take $10 Billion Charge in 4th Quarter
headline.main: AT&tT to Take $10 Billion Charge in 4th Quarter
